DISCORD_BOT_TOKEN: Discord Bot Token of notifier bot
DISCORD_USER_ID: Discord User ID of user to notify
HOST: Host for Render web services (default is 0.0.0.0)
INTERVAL: Interval of checking the store in seconds
ITEM_URL: URL of item to check for in the online shop
PORT: Port for Render web services (default is 10000)
PYTHON_VERSION: Python version to run on Render
STORE: File name of the store to import to main
